title: Test
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 41 data points.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year

Inflation rate compared to previous year is rapidly decreasing from 1984 to 1987, rapidly increasing from 1987 to 1989, roughly constant from 1989 to 1993, gradually decreasing from 1993 to 1994, gradually constant from 1994 to 1997, slightly decreasing from 1997 to 1998, roughly constant from 1998 to 1999, rapidly increasing from 1999 to 2000, gradually decreasing from 2000 to 2001, roughly constant from 2001 to 2002, slightly increasing from 2002 to 2003, gradually constant from 2003 to 2005, slightly decreasing from 2005 to 2006, roughly constant from 2006 to 2007, gradually increasing from 2007 to 2008, rapidly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2011, rapidly decreasing from 2011 to 2016, rapidly increasing from 2016 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2024.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Max Inflation rate compared to previous year about 5.64 was recorded at Year 1984
Min Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.01 was recorded at Year 2009
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 41 data points. The chart has 6 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2019.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 1993 to 2000.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2005 to 2011.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 1987 to 1993.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2019 to 2024.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2000 to 2005.
